attributes.action: make it an official issue of child protection when parents let their children ride bikes on the road without a safety helmet . This also applies to letting children travel on the shoulders or back of an adult while the adult cycles the bike
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present it is not against the law for children to cycle on roads without a safety helmet, and nothing stopping adults from transporting children on their bikes without making them wear a helmet. We feel that this should be a matter of child protection as well as health and safety, and not making sure that your child is safe on their bike is putting them at risk.
